page.description: Specify the Id of the button in the Panel Navigator Header or Footer that should be used for the 'Back' button.

section.description: As with the other button Id properties, the choices presented in the 'Back button id' dropdown list are the buttons that were defined inside the Panel Navigator's Panel Header or Footer.
The "Previous" button moves to the previous panel in the Panel Navigator's flow. The 'Back' button moves to the last Panel to be viewed, which might not be the previous panel.

figure.title: Clicking the Back button in this case will be bring you to Panel 3
Clicking the Previous button will bring you to Panel 1
